description: Amended piling design and layout for extensions to Blocks A and C, further to Listed Building Consent 19/01212/LBC (Alterations and extensions of existing student Seething Wells Campus to provide additional student accommodation and ancillary facilities. Rooftop extensions to existing buildings to provide 159 new student rooms, alterations to Listed Buildings to provide a cafe, flexible meeting and recreation spaces and other ancillary facilities.)
decision_conditions: The works hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this consent.Reason: This is required by Section 18 of the Planning (Listed Building and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 (as amended).

The development shall be implemented in accordance with the revised piling details as set out within the accompanying Heritage Statement November 2020 and accompanying design details, except where expressly specified otherwise on the approved drawings.Reason: To prevent harm to the significance of designated heritage assets, in accordance with policy HC1 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM12 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Condition 48 (Accessibility Statement and Management Plan) of planning permission 20/02942/FUL states:Prior to the commencement of development (other than demolition and site enabling works) in each Development Plot or Phase, a detailed accessibility statement and management plan (including a programme for implementation) is submitted outlining those measures proposed to ensure an accessible and inclusive environment, both internally and externally, including but not limited to, pedestrian routes, lift specifications, accessible toilet provision, access points along with blue badge spaces. Such a statement is to be approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the approved details.Reason: Access arrangements must be identified prior to the commencement of development to ensure an inclusive environment.Officer response: The submitted information is considered to be sufficient. As such, the details submitted for Condition 48 (Accessibility Statement and Management Plan) in relation to Plot E, Phase 1 are hereby approved.
Please provide 'Biodiversity Checklist.' The Biodiversity Checklists can be obtained via the council's website:https://www.kingston.gov.uk/downloads/file/2738/biodiversity-checklist
